mapper.select: SELECT auth_resource.id, auth_resource.code, auth_resource.name, auth_resource.category, auth_resource.level, auth_resource.status, auth_resource.create_time, auth_resource.creator, auth_resource.modifier, auth_resource.modify_time, auth_resource.version FROM auth_resource inner join auth_privilege on auth_privilege.resource_id=auth_resource.id inner join auth_user_privilege on auth_privilege.id=auth_user_privilege.privilege_id where auth_resource.status=#{status} and auth_privilege.status=#{status} and auth_user_privilege.user_id=#{userId}
